Passive: Summons may be deployed on ranged tiles and deals Arts damage
Active: Ling and her summons deal 250% ATK as Arts damage to 2 enemies within Attack Range and Bind them for 1.5 seconds
After the skill ends, retrieve all summons with less than 50% HP; Can store 1 charge(s)

Passive: Summons may be deployed on melee tiles. If there are other summons within their attack range, combines them into a Higher form
Active: Ling and her summons gain +40% ATK and +40% DEF. Each summon deals 20% of Ling's ATK as Arts damage to enemies in the four adjacent tiles every 0.5 seconds
After the skill ends, gain 1 summon

elite_levels.description: Can use up to 3 Summons (max 3 deployed at once). Summons' effect changes based upon Skill
Can use up to 4 Summons (max 3 deployed at once). Summons' effect changes based upon Skill
Can use up to 5 Summons (max 3 deployed at once). Summons' effect changes based upon Skill

talents.name: So is Writ, an Ode to Wine

elite_levels.description: When a summon is defeated/absorbed/retrieved, Ling gains +2 SP and ATK +2% (ATK increase stacks up to 5 times)
When a summon is defeated/absorbed/retrieved, Ling gains +3 SP and ATK +3% (ATK increase stacks up to 5 times)

potential_upgrades.description: When a summon is defeated/absorbed/retrieved, Ling gains +3 (+1) SP and ATK +2% (ATK increase stacks up to 5 times)
When a summon is defeated/absorbed/retrieved, Ling gains +4 (+1) SP and ATK +3% (ATK increase stacks up to 5 times)
